note.p: Scottish gardener. Employed by Alfred Meadows at Poyle Manor, Colnbrook, Buckinghamshire; bailiff at Cookham, 1891; nurseryman at Colnbrook, 1901; landscape gardener in Fulham, Middlesex, 1911.
BMD (Birth index, Marriage index, Death index)
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/1329/126/11), 1891 (RG12/1004/77/21), 1901 (RG13/1339/109/4), 1911 (RG14/346)
Census returns of Scotland 1851 (The National Archives of Scotland: Auchterless 6/3)
